title: How do I sign in to enter the racing contest
text:
To enter the contest to win the Ultimate Florida Vacation, including Daytona 500 Victory Lane access, you can go to http://www.starnewsonline.com/contests. This page takes a while to load. 



If you're having problems accessing the above URL, you can go directly to http://starnewsonline.secondstreetapp.com/Ultimate-Florida-Vacation-Sweepstakes/.
